title: These were the days: Victoria revisited
creator_credit: David Morgan and Kestrel Film Productions
brief_description: Takes the audience around Victoria to see the preserving of history in country towns. The port of Echuca where the paddle streamer Canberra runs up the Murray River; Sovereign Hill in Ballarat; Burke Museum at Beechworth; The Museum of Agricultural Machinery at Warracknabeal; The Gippsland Folk Museum at Moe; Coal Creek mining town at Korumburra and the Pioneer Settlement.
